name: Penn and Teller: 50 Years of Magic
description:
Amazing magic. Tremendous trickery. Hilarious antics.

Get ready to have your mind blown! Watch as the world's most legendary magicians, Pen and Teller celebrate their milestone anniversary. The celebrated duo will blend classic favourites with astonishing new illusions, all delivered with their trademark wit and showmanship for an unforgettable live experience.

David Letterman lauds them as "evil geniusesâ€”always amazing, always entertaining," while The New York Times hails their act as "a witheringly funny, brazen assault on the temple of magic," and The Times of London declares that "the comedy-magic duo are at their absolute peak:.
